meanings.sent1: I tried to mathematize the problem by using numbers and equations.
meanings.sent2: Teachers often mathematize complex concepts to help students understand better.
meanings.sent3: When my friend tried to mathematize cooking, he ended up with a recipe for disaster!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a calculator, able to mathematize any situation instantly.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's ability to mathematize natural phenomena revolutionized the field of physics.

meanings.sent4: His approach was to mathematize every problem, even those that seemed purely abstract.
meanings.sent5: The professor's ability to mathematize any concept made him a sought-after mentor in the department.
